entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 10:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -25.1°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -27.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
